verses.verse: Oh give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord, <WH3068> call <WH7121> upon His name; <WH8034> Make <WH3045> known <WH3045> His deeds <WH5949> among the peoples. <WH5971>
Sing <WH7891> to Him, sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Him; Speak <WH7878> of all <WH3605> His wonders. <WH6381>
Glory <WH1984> in His holy <WH6944> name; <WH8034> Let the heart <WH3820> of those who seek <WH1245> the Lord <WH3068> be glad. <WH8055>
Seek <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068> and His strength; <WH5797> Seek <WH1245> His face <WH6440> continually. <WH8548>
Remember <WH2142> His wonders <WH4159> which <WH834> He has done, <WH6213> His marvels, <WH4159> and the judgments <WH4941> uttered by His mouth, <WH6310>
O seed <WH2233> of Abraham, <WH85> His servant, <WH5650> O sons <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> His chosen <WH972> ones! <WH972>
He is the Lord <WH3068> our God; <WH430> His judgments <WH4941> are in all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
He has remembered <WH2142> His covenant <WH1285> forever, <WH5769> The word <WH1697> which He commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations, <WH1755>
[The covenant] which <WH834> He made <WH3772> with Abraham, <WH85> And His oath <WH7621> to Isaac. <WH3327>
Then He confirmed <WH5975> it to Jacob <WH3290> for a statute, <WH2706> To Israel <WH3478> as an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285>
Saying, <WH559> "To you I will give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> As the portion <WH9112> of your inheritance, <WH5159>"
When they were only a few <WH4962> men <WH4962> in number, <WH4557> Very few, <WH4592> and strangers <WH1481> in it.
And they wandered <WH1980> about from nation <WH1471> to nation, <WH1471> From [one] kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people. <WH5971>
He permitted <WH5117> no <WH3808> man <WH120> to oppress <WH6231> them, And He reproved <WH3198> kings <WH4428> for their sakes: <WH5921>
"Do not touch <WH5060> My anointed <WH4899> ones, <WH4899> And do <WH7489> My prophets <WH5030> no <WH408> harm. <WH7489>"
And He called <WH7121> for a famine <WH7458> upon the land; <WH776> He broke <WH7665> the whole <WH3605> staff <WH4294> of bread. <WH3899>
He sent <WH7971> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> them, Joseph, <WH3130> [who] was sold <WH4376> as a slave. <WH5650>
They afflicted <WH6031> his feet <WH7272> with fetters, <WH3525> He himself <WH5315> was laid <WH935> in irons; <WH1270>
Until <WH5704> the time <WH6256> that his word <WH1697> came <WH935> to pass, <WH935> The word <WH565> of the Lord <WH3068> tested <WH6884> him.
The king <WH4428> sent <WH7971> and released <WH5425> him, The ruler <WH4910> of peoples, <WH5971> and set <WH6605> him free. <WH6605>
He made <WH7760> him lord <WH113> of his house, <WH1004> And ruler <WH4910> over all <WH3605> his possessions, <WH7075>
To imprison <WH631> his princes <WH8269> at will, <WH5315> That he might teach <WH2449> his elders <WH2205> wisdom. <WH2449>
Israel <WH3478> also came <WH935> into Egypt; <WH4714> Thus Jacob <WH3290> sojourned <WH1481> in the land <WH776> of Ham. <WH2526>
And He caused His people <WH5971> to be very <WH3966> fruitful, <WH6509> And made <WH6105> them stronger <WH6105> than <WH4480> their adversaries. <WH6862>
He turned <WH2015> their heart <WH3820> to hate <WH8130> His people, <WH5971> To deal <WH5230> craftily <WH5230> with His servants. <WH5650>
He sent <WH7971> Moses <WH4872> His servant, <WH5650> [And] Aaron <WH175> whom <WH834> He had chosen. <WH977>
They performed <WH7760> His wondrous <WH226> acts <WH1697> among them, And miracles <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Ham. <WH2526>
He sent <WH7971> darkness <WH2822> and made <WH2821> [it] dark; <WH2821> And they did not rebel <WH4784> against <WH854> His words. <WH1697>
He turned <WH2015> their waters <WH4325> into blood, <WH1818> And caused their fish <WH1710> to die. <WH4191>
Their land <WH776> swarmed <WH8317> with frogs <WH6854> [Even] in the chambers <WH2315> of their kings. <WH4428>
He spoke, <WH559> and there came <WH935> a swarm <WH6157> of flies <WH6157> [And] gnats <WH3654> in all <WH3605> their territory. <WH1366>
He gave <WH5414> them hail <WH1259> for rain, <WH1653> [And] flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> in their land. <WH776>
He struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> their vines <WH1612> also and their fig <WH8384> trees, <WH8384> And shattered <WH7665> the trees <WH6086> of their territory. <WH1366>
He spoke, <WH559> and locusts <WH697> came, <WH935> And young <WH3218> locusts, <WH3218> even without <WH369> number, <WH4557>
And ate <WH398> up all <WH3605> vegetation <WH6212> in their land, <WH776> And ate <WH398> up the fruit <WH6529> of their ground. <WH127>
He also struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> all <WH3605> the first-born <WH7225> in their land, <WH776> The first fruits <WH7225> of all <WH3605> their vigor. <WH202>
Then He brought <WH3318> them out with silver <WH3701> and gold; <WH2091> And among His tribes <WH7626> there <WH369> was not one <WH369> who stumbled. <WH3782>
Egypt <WH4714> was glad <WH8055> when they departed; <WH3318> For the dread <WH6343> of them had fallen <WH5307> upon them.
He spread <WH6566> a cloud <WH6051> for a covering, <WH4539> And fire <WH784> to illumine <WH215> by night. <WH3915>
They asked, <WH7592> and He brought <WH935> quail, <WH7958> And satisfied <WH7646> them with the bread <WH3899> of heaven. <WH8064>
He opened <WH6605> the rock, <WH6697> and water <WH4325> flowed <WH2100> out; It ran <WH1980> in the dry <WH6723> places <WH6723> [like] a river. <WH5104>
For He remembered <WH2142> His holy <WH6944> word <WH1697> [With] Abraham <WH85> His servant; <WH5650>
And He brought <WH3318> forth <WH3318> His people <WH5971> with joy, <WH8342> His chosen <WH972> ones <WH972> with a joyful <WH7440> shout. <WH7440>
He gave <WH5414> them also the lands <WH776> of the nations, <WH1471> That they might take <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of [the fruit of] the peoples' labor, <WH5999>
So <WH5668> that they might keep <WH8104> His statutes, <WH2706> And observe <WH5341> His laws, <WH8451> Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
